alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:41PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pitkin County through 630 PM MDT... At 541 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Carbondale, or 19 miles south of Glenwood Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Pitkin County, including the following locations... Redstone. This includes Colorado 133 between mile markers 51 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
